      • updateSystemTime

        public void updateSystemTime(java.lang.String s)
                      throws java.time.format.DateTimeParseException,
                             java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Updates the time of the clock.
        Parameters:
        s - the new time of the clock.
        Postcondition:
        the time of the clock will be set to the given time.
        Throws:
        java.time.format.DateTimeParseException - if the text cannot be parsed
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the new time if before the old time.
